title: TT Pro League awards
text: The TT Pro League awards is an annual <a href="award">award</a>s ceremony commemorating <a href="association%20football">football</a>-related people, given at the conclusion of each <a href="TT%20Pro%20League">TT Pro League</a> season since its inauguration in <a href="1999%20in%20association%20football">1999</a>. The ceremony is held prior to the opening match of the following Pro League season. In addition to the annual <a href="TT%20Pro%20League%20Golden%20Boot">Golden Boot</a> recipient, the awards ceremony honours the "Player", "Manager", "Referee", "Assistant Referee", and "Match Commissioner" of the previous season. Beginning in 2005, the Pro League has also recognised the best position players of each season. The individual recipients are awarded "Best Goalkeeper", "Defender", "Midfielder", and "Forward". There are only two team award recipients each year: "Best Team" and "Most Disciplined Team of the Year".
